definition: variant of 兇惡|凶恶, fierce/ferocious/fiendish/frightening

sentences.english: "It's been a long day and I took out my aggravation on you.
sentences.chinese: “这是一个漫长的一天，我对你这么凶恶。

sentences.english: The people is held down by a vicious and repressive military regime.
sentences.chinese: 人民受着凶恶而专制的军政权的压迫。

sentences.english: In foreign country the people mention the bat thinks of the ugly image.
sentences.chinese: 在番邦，们提到蝙蝠，就想到丑恶凶恶的景。

sentences.english: A long scar across his cheek makes him look fiendish but he is very good-natured.
sentences.chinese: 他面颊上的长疤令他看起来很凶恶，但是他却很善良。

sentences.english: I started to offer help, but the fierce glare on his face stopped me.
sentences.chinese: 我正想要帮助他，但他脸上凶恶的表情把我吓住了。

sentences.english: With his back to the wall, the animal became ferocious.
sentences.chinese: 这头困兽变得凶恶起来。

sentences.english: A person with a vicious heart becomes a wolf or a tiger.
sentences.chinese: 一个凶恶的人会变成虎狼。

sentences.english: In dogs with a dark mask the expression appears more stern, but never ill-natured .
sentences.chinese: 面部有深色面具，使表情显得严厉，但不凶恶。

sentences.english: So fierce was their dog that no one dared come near.
sentences.chinese: 他们的狗真凶恶，没有人敢走近它。

sentences.english: one of the contenders for the world's most vicious ant.
sentences.chinese: 她们是世界上最凶恶的蚂蚁的之一。

sentences.english: The judge shall dismiss from the ring any shy or vicious Giant Schnauzer.
sentences.chinese: 裁判将开除任何对胆怯的狗和凶恶的狗。

sentences.english: It was decorated with sinister family portraits and looming animal heads.
sentences.chinese: 到处装点着凶恶的家族肖像和阴森的动物头颅。

sentences.english: It is futile to follow a teacher who is always hostile to sentient beings, who are your own parents.
sentences.chinese: 若追随一位凶恶对待如母有情生的导师，也是徒劳。

sentences.english: When people mean to do bad and cruel things, they can easily make excuses for it.
sentences.chinese: 凡人欲为凶恶残酷之行，其口实正自易求也。

sentences.english: But God is faithful, who will strengthen and keep you from evil.
sentences.chinese: 主是忠信的，他必坚固你们，保护你们免于凶恶。

sentences.english: The cruel criminal committed towering crimes these days.
sentences.chinese: 那个凶恶的罪犯这些日子犯了滔天大罪。

definition: show one's ferocious appearance (idiom); the atrocious features revealed/with fangs bared
